You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Sopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D54A.
  * `&sopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D564.
